org.eclipse.dataset.roi

Class ROIBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.ROIBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, INameable, IROI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircularROI, OrientableROIBase, PointROI, RingROI

    public class ROIBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IROI, java.io.Serializable
    Base class for general region of interest
    See Also:
